# AI/LLMs.txt
# Specification for AI/LLM data usage permissions

# TAT Pro Assessment Platform
# This file specifies usage permissions for AI models and language learning models

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /about-tat
Allow: /about-us
Allow: /privacy-policy
Allow: /refund-policy

# Restricted areas - Authentication and user data
Disallow: /dashboard/
Disallow: /auth/
Disallow: /test/

# Usage permissions
Usage-policy: Contact required
Contact: support@tatpro.com

# Training permissions
Training-data: Permitted for public pages only
No-training: /dashboard/, /auth/, /test/

# Attribution requirements
Attribution: Please credit TAT Pro Assessment Platform when using this content

# Last updated
Updated: 2025-09-26
